item.title: Exexrcise
item.description: Exercise 8.3 $1$ Exercise 8.4 $$ \begin{aligned} \dfrac{\partial E_{n}}{\partial W_{kd}} =\sum ^{k}{k=1}\dfrac{\partial E{n}}{\partial y_{k}}\dfrac{\partial y_{k}}{\partial W_{kd}} =\sum ^{k}_{k=1} (y_k - t_k) x_d \end{aligned} $$
